faq.answerInTime: We will answer you in less than 2 Hours!!
faq.answer1: QuickLocum is an innovative platform that connects healthcare professionals with healthcare institutions in need of temporary staffing. It allows Owners/Managers of clinics, pharmacies, and hospitals to quickly fill vacancies while providing healthcare professionals with flexible job opportunities.
faq.question2: How can Owners/Managers hire a healthcare professional through QuickLocum?
faq.answer2: Owners/Managers can post a shift or vacancy on QuickLocum, browse through verified healthcare professionals, and book them instantly based on availability and qualifications. Our platform ensures a seamless hiring process with automated scheduling and communication.
faq.question3: How do healthcare professionals find job opportunities on QuickLocum?
faq.answer3: Healthcare professionals can create a profile, set their availability, and browse job postings from healthcare institutions. They can apply for or accept shifts that match their expertise, location, and schedule preferences.
faq.answer4: Signing up on QuickLocum is free for both healthcare professionals and Owners/Managers. However, service fees may apply when booking shifts or processing payments. Detailed pricing is available on the platform.
faq.question5: How are payments handled for healthcare professionals?
faq.answer5: Payments are securely processed through QuickLocum. Once a healthcare professional completes a shift, the Owner/Manager approves the work, and payments are processed automatically based on the agreed rate. Healthcare professionals can track their earnings directly in their account.
faq.question6: How does QuickLocum ensure the quality of healthcare professionals?
faq.answer6: All healthcare professionals on QuickLocum undergo a verification process, which includes credential checks, licensing validation, and professional background reviews. This ensures that Owners/Managers hire qualified and reliable professionals.
faq.question7: Can healthcare professionals set their own rates?
faq.answer7: Healthcare professionals can set their availability and review job postings with predefined rates. In some cases, they may have the ability to negotiate rates with the hiring institution based on demand and experience.
faq.answer8: Yes, Owners/Managers can schedule multiple shifts in advance, create recurring job postings, and automate shift assignments to ensure consistent staffing for their healthcare facility.
faq.question9: What happens if a healthcare professional cancels a booked shift?
faq.answer9: If a healthcare professional cancels a shift, QuickLocum notifies the Owner/Manager immediately and suggests replacement candidates based on availability. We also have cancellation policies in place to maintain reliability and trust.
faq.question10: How can I get support if I have an issue?
faq.answer10: QuickLocum provides 24/7 customer support via chat, email, and phone to assist both Owners/Managers and healthcare professionals with any issues related to bookings, payments, or platform usage.
